item.title: Yati & aruNmukhAdi
item.description: Source: here. Yet within this framework we also have Indra dispatching a group called the Yatins by quite literally ‘throwing them to the Wolves’ [I choose to render ‘Salavrka’ in the obvious fashion in light of broader IE evidence for such a clade: as ‘Temple Wolves’ (strictly speaking, ‘Shalavrkas’ – in singular and with proper textual accenting, Śālāvṛka / शालावृक ) or ‘Wolves of the [Ritual] Enclosure’ (Sālāvṛka /सालावृक );+++(5)+++
